title: Solution to Ranked Play: Remove Bronze
body:
Remove it.

Make it so that you have to win x amount of games in your placements to play ranked. Lowest tier being SIlver 5. If you lose enough games at Silver 5 with 0LP you will be kicked out of ranked and will have to play x amount of games in normal draft before being able to reattempt your placement matches. Another suggestion: Having to wait a week before being able to attempt placement matches. 

Each season there would be an unlimited amount of times to reattempt placements after being dropped from ranked with the restriction of the aforementioned penalties.

End of season awards: Gold and higher. 
An aside: I sometimes thought the silver borders around player cards indicated S4 bronzies.

Reason for this idea?: If you're not good at the game you should not be playing in ranked queues hence why there should be a chance that players drop from ranked altogether and have to go through a "rehab", so to speak, before trying to get placed back in to ranked. If you're good enough you will stay in ranked. This will remove having questionably horrible teammates and the notion of elo hell.


Thoughts? Suggestions?

Riot, please and thank you.


**Edit: I think it might have been over-zealous of me to have suggested entirely removing bronze but all the other ideas I still stand behind. The main point being "Ranked is competitive and players should be to."**

replies.body: So what you're saying is people shouldn't be able to get better at the game? Normal Draft and ranked Draft are very different entities because not everyone who does normal Draft want to play ranked. In the few ranked games I've played I've typically had a much harder time in lane than I normally would. Why? Because the people in ranked games tend to play better and are more skilled than people looking to just play a quick game and be done with it. In a normal game I expect to do well. If I am comfortable with the champion I am playing I will have no problem winning lane. If at this point I only play normals what reason would I have to get better? However, in ranked I don't have as easy of a time winning lane. Even if I am on a comfortable champion it is much harder because my opponent tries. So in ranked I have a reason to improve.

The problem is that you're creating a solution to something that really won't end up doing anything. What is trying to be done here? All you'll do is eliminate most Bronze players and punish them for not being good at the game. Players wouldn't get better from this, it's actually quite possible that they would become worse since some lower Bronze players would temporarily make it through the filter until inevitably dropping, or if enough players make it through, which will probably happen anyway, Silver would become worse as a whole and would basically become the new Bronze. The system is already frustrating for low elo players, and forcing them out of ranked if they do poorly would make it worse. Nothing would be solved from this.

Why would forcing them out make it worse? The only real difference it'll create is that it significantly limits trolls- if they go on giant losing streaks, they get removed from ranked. There's no difference between ranked and normal draft, so it's not like game-to-game will be affected.

It takes players out of the system for no other reason than that they're not good enough to be ranked. It also does nothing to filter out bad players since some will get through anyway, especially if they face players who are also looking to get into ranked. It doesn't really reduce trolls either, since they'll probably just troll draft games instead. I imagine that normal draft will be ruined since people will have no incentive to try and will just be trying to get through their games so they can try to get ranked again. Not to mention that it's not very friendly to newer players. 

Why are we trying to filter out these players in the first place? Bronze exists for a reason.

Why *does* Bronze exist? Why are people allowed to be infinitely bad in a competitive environment? The goal is to be good. Trolls *should* be removed from ranked and put into normals, the same with players with sub-50% win rates. Not a lot of people that play this game would disagree with a skill floor (although, you're right, actually designing an effective  one would be difficult)
